user_instruction: 'Send an email to Lisa (lisa.caregiver@example.com) with some insights about Ethan to help her get started. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Ethan’s Latest Care Details

Hi NotionManager Team,

I’m preparing an introductory email for Lisa, Ethan’s prospective caregiver, and I’d like to make sure I’m sharing the most accurate, up-to-date information. Could you please pull the following items from our Notion workspace (Ethan Care):

• Daily routine (wake-up/bedtime, meal times, hygiene, naps)  
• Preferred foods, snacks, and any dietary restrictions  
• Favorite activities, toys, or motivators  
• Communication style and helpful prompts/keywords  
• Current therapy schedule (OT, PT, speech) and latest progress notes  
• Known triggers, calming strategies, and safety considerations  
• Any visual schedules, charts, or reference documents that would be useful for a new caregiver

A concise summary (bullet points are fine) plus links or attachments to the relevant Notion pages would be perfect.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
Jane

final_output:
